sentences.english: Project management can also benefit from modularisation.
sentences.chinese: 模塊化也可給項目管理帶來方便。

sentences.english: Management at Home and Abroad. He Qi Chen Libin (Site Investigation and Design Research …
sentences.chinese: 國內外工程項目管理現狀比較與探討。

sentences.english: Responsible for project mgt and developing business and brand strategies.
sentences.chinese: 負責項目管理，業務發展與品牌戰略。

sentences.english: What is your expectation of the course of Project Management?
sentences.chinese: 您對成功的項目管理集訓這門課期望的是什麼？

sentences.english: Depending upon heroics to get your product out the door is simply bad program management.
sentences.chinese: 讓裝腔作勢使你的產品出局是最糟糕的項目管理。

sentences.english: In case of any problems encountered during enforcement, please feedback in timely to the Management Department of Current Accounts under the SAFE.
sentences.chinese: 執行中如遇問題請及時向總局經常項目管理司反饋。

sentences.english: Well working backgrounded, good comprehensive for project and team management.
sentences.chinese: 良好的專業背景，綜合性的團隊與項目管理能力。

sentences.english: So the projects management is not only the window of the enterprise but also the key of the enterprise creating high quality engineering.
sentences.chinese: 項目管理是企業的窗口，是企業創優質樹品牌的關鍵。

sentences.english: There are only about ten years since Project Management was introduced into China.
sentences.chinese: 項目管理的發展，在我囡只有十幾年的歷史。

sentences.english: The government to the tradition invests that the project control means reforms imperatively .
sentences.chinese: 對傳統的政府投資項目管理方式改革勢在必行。

sentences.english: Responsible for design and project management of transfusion pump.
sentences.chinese: 負責輸液泵的設計開發與項目管理。

sentences.english: We are now popularizing agent of construction system gradually in our government invest projects.
sentences.chinese: 我國政府投資項目中正逐步推行代建制項目管理模式。

sentences.english: Certificate of completion authorized by U. S. A. Project Management Institute for 2 days course.
sentences.chinese: 課程結束後頒發美國項目管理協會認證的結業證書。

sentences.english: Master Project Management Agreement upon completion of the Disposal.
sentences.chinese: 成後訂立主項目管理協議。

sentences.english: One of the central tasks of web design is project management.
sentences.chinese: 項目管理是網頁設計工作的重心環節之一。

sentences.english: The application of TOC in project management is called Critical Chain Project Management ( CCPM) , which controls the project by critical chain and buffer.
sentences.chinese: 它通過項目的關鍵鏈，並利用緩衝器來進行項目管理。

definition: to contract for an entire project
